name: Rock Paper Scissors Crash
description:
Rock beats paper beats scissors.

The classic triangle is second nature to almost everyone by now-- but how well can you learn new mechanics on the fly?

Play your way through ten 30-second rounds in this runner/ryhthm game (with no music!), each introducing an additional mechanic to juggle amidst the chaos! Featuring fully visual tutorials and hand-drawn graphics, Rock Paper Scissors Crash is a focus-heavy gaming experience designed to reward your patience and quick thinking.
